column1: logging onto facebook to make the same post that 5 million other people did - of a 12 pack of coronas, with the caption 'i have the corona virus' and watch everyone roar with laughter and a standing ovation.
Per local CBS news - 5 confirmed cases of Corona Virus in U.S., reports there may be 3 cases in VA pending confirmation.
Tom Cotton keeps repeating a coronavirus conspiracy theory that was already debunked https://www.washingtonpost.com/politics/2020/02/16/tom-cotton-coronavirus-conspiracy/ …
Trump will just go #cheatgolfing and make sure no one else is there so he can golf coronavirus-free.
Between the coronavirus and the stock market and getting my hand eaten by an elevator I might just order a pizza
